dialogue: P Hello Ma'am, I am Mitch Mitchell Junior, with the Infernal Revenue Service. I've come to investigate your office for possible tax fr-
N JENNY! ANOTHER CALLER FOR YOU. AND BE FUCKING POLITE THIS TIME!
P Ahem, could you please -
N I have no time to talk to low-salary employees.
E
P Do you have any idea who this receipt could belong to? I found it laying in the trash.
N Yes, because I pay very close attention to every crumpled up piece of paper that people toss in the garbage around here.
P  A 'No' would have sufficed.
E
P I heard that Jadis recently carried a big box into the office.
P Do you know where they might have put it?
N Do you think I care enough about these people to pay attention to where they put every little thing?
P The box would be a pretty big thing, and I don't see it anywhere.
P Is there any other place it could be?
N There's a storage room, on the left side of the elevator.
NPYou will find the door buried behind all the trash, right next to my hopes and dreams.
E
P I heard that Jadis recently carried a big box into the office.
P Do you know where they might have put it?
N Do you think I care enough about these people to pay attention to where they put every little thing?
P The box would be a pretty big thing, and I don't see it anywhere.
P Is there any other place it could be?
N There's a the storage room, on the left side of the elevator.
N You will find the door buried behind all the trash, right next to my hopes and dreams.
E
P I found the box, but it doesn't say to whom it was delivered, and it was empty. Do you know where the contents could have been put?
N No I wouldn't know anything about that.
E
P I found the box, but it doesn't say to whom it was delivered, and it was empty. Do you know where the contents could have been put?
N No I wouldn't know anything about that.
E
P Are you, or is anyone else in the office, interested in collecting angel figurines?
N You are severely overestimating my emotional engagement in you, them, or any of this.
E
P Are you, or is anyone else in the office, interested in collecting angel figurines?
N You are severely overestimating my emotional engagement in you, them, or any of this.
E
N Hello Sir, what seems to be the problem?
P Well, I -
N Pssst I'm on the phone
N (On the phone) You think you may have been wrongfully placed in hell?
N (On the phone) What? You think that you're only down here because you're gay?
N (On the phone) Sir, it says on your file that you murdered ten people in cold blood.
N (On the phone) No, we're not homophobic, YOU'RE JUST HOMOCIDAL.
P Excuse me -
N AAAAAAAaaaaaah!
E
P Do you know -
N (On the phone) No, you can't use a 'Get Out of Jail Free' card to get out of hell, because that is from a board game-
N (On the phone) -AND THIS IS ETERNAL DAMNATION YOU CAN'T ESCAPE FROM!
P (I don't think I'll get a response out of her.)
E
N (On the phone) No Sir, you do indeed deserve to suffer the tortures of tartarus. Yes. BECAUSE YOU TRIED TO SCALP THE NINTENDO SWITCH 2 FOR TRIPLE IT'S VALUE.
P That is indeed deserved.
E
N (On the phone) No Sir, you do indeed deserve to suffer the tortures of tartarus. Yes. BECAUSE YOU TRIED TO SCALP THE NINTENDO SWITCH 2 FOR TRIPLE IT'S VALUE.
P That is indeed deserved.
E
N (On the phone) Yes ma'am, drawing Sonic x Shadow erotic fanart is indeed one of the gravest of sins...
N (On the phone) ...AND IT DOESN'T MATTER THAT YOU WERE ELEVEN YEARS OLD WHEN YOU DID IT.
E
N (On the phone) Yes ma'am, drawing Sonic x Shadow erotic fanart is indeed one of the gravest of sins...
N (On the phone) ...AND IT DOESN'T MATTER THAT YOU WERE ELEVEN YEARS OLD WHEN YOU DID IT.
E
N (On the phone) Yes, unironically liking 'Rise of Skywalker' will get you send straight to hell...
N (On the phone) ...AND YOU DESERVE IT BECAUSE THE WRITING OF THAT MOVIE IS GARBAGE AND -
N They hung up.
N WAIT I DON'T HAVE ANY CALLERS RIGHT NOW, WHAT DO I DO, I'M NOT USED TO THIS -
P You could tell me who in this office has an interest in collecting angel figurines.
N I don't know...this is the first time in a long time I'm actually seeing my environment...
NPBut I did see Stephen try to covertly put something in his cupboard several times.
N He thinks that if he hides it under his shirt and whistles loudly it will be less suspicous.
P Thank you for your assistance.
N ... What do I do with myself now? Who am I?
E
N (On the phone) Yes, unironically liking 'Rise of Skywalker' will get you send straight to hell...
N (On the phone) ...AND YOU DESERVE IT BECAUSE THE WRITING OF THAT MOVIE IS GARBAGE AND -
N They hung up.
N WAIT I DON'T HAVE ANY CALLERS RIGHT NOW, WHAT DO I DO, I'M NOT USED TO THIS -
P You could tell me who in this office has an interest in collecting angel figurines.
N I don't know...this is the first time in a long time I'm actually seeing my environment...
N But I did see Stephen try to covertly put something in his cupboard several times.
N He thinks that if he hides it under his shirt and whistles loudly it will be less suspicous.
P Thank you for your assistance.
N ... What do I do with myself now? Who am I?
E
P Hello Sir, I am here to investigate a case of suspected tax fraud. Could you give me any information regarding suspicious activity?
N I think I'm gonna throw up.
P Please don't.
E
P Do you know who this import tax receipt belongs to?
N Nnnnnnngh.
P I don't know what I expected.
E
P Jadis recently carried a big box into the office. Do you know where she might have put it?
N Oaaargh...
P Is that a yes?
N Urrrrghhh.
P Do I need to call an ambulance.
E
P Jadis recently carried a big box into the office. Do you know where she might have put it?
N Oaaargh...
P Is that a yes?
N Urrrrghhh.
P Do I need to call an ambulance.
E
P The address on this box has been scratched off, do you know who it might belong to?
N Ouuwaahhhh......
P ...Sigh
P Do you know any place other than the storage room where people might put their stuff?
N Urgh! Ngggh! Gggghh!
P Great talk.
E
P The address on this box has been scratched off, do you know who it might belong to?
N Ouuwaahhhh......
P ...Sigh
P Do you know any place other than the storage room where people might put their stuff?
N Urgh! Ngggh! Gggghh!
P Great talk.
E
P Do you, or does anyone else here, have an interest in angel figurines.
N Careful where you tread, son.
E
P Do you, or does anyone else here, have an interest in angel figurines.
N Careful where you tread, son.
E
P .... Hello Sir?
N Approach my brother, I shall do you no harm.
P .... You are the first person that is actually talking to me.
N The poor souls of this department are responsible for providing customer support for all of humanity.
N They seek different ways of coping.
P How do you cope?
N I just stopped picking up calls.
N Anyhow, how may I help you my brother?
P I am with the IRS, and here to investigate possible tax fraud. Have you noticed any suspicous activity around the office?
N I must dissapoint you, for I have been so immersed in meditation that I have not been conscious to the happenings of this immortal coil.
P Anything else you might be able to tell me then? Maybe about your colleagues?
N Certainly my brother.
N The Lady in the front is Sharon, our superior.
N She delegates the work to us, then goes on smoke breaks.
N She may not hold herself to high standards, but she certainly does so for us.
N The girl after her is Jenny, our newest employe.
N She is the only still trying, and therefore receives everybody elses work.
N If I were her I would forgo the years of suffering and skip straight to enlightement.
N After that is Stephen.
N He's been working here longest after Sharon, but he's still an intern.
N I don't know if he has managed to figure out how to pick up a phone yet.
N The person behind me is Jadis.
N Do not worry about the fumes emitting from their desk, it is their tool to enlightement.
P And what is your name?
N This humble soul is known as Damien.
N If you have need for answers, do not hesitate to approach me.
E
P I found this import tax receipt in the trash nearby, and it doesn't seem to have been paid yet.
P Do you know who this could belong to?
N I do not brother, I apologize.
P Do you know anyone who may have ordered something into the office?
NPI did see Jadis carrying a big box from the elevator. You might want to inquire about that.
E
P Did you also happen to notice where Jadis put the box?
N No, they only briefly appeared at the edge of my perception before disappearing again.
E
P Did you also happen to notice where Jadis put the box?
N No, they only briefly appeared at the edge of my perception before disappearing again.
E
P The address on this package has been scratched off, do you know who it might belong to?
N Forgive me, this is the first time this earthly belonging has been brought before me.
P I see. Can you tell me if there is any extra space where people might put their things then?
N Such a place doesn't exist, and I woulnd't try to find it my brother.
E
P The address on this package has been scratched off, do you know who it might belong to?
N Forgive me, this is the first time this earthly belonging has been brought before me.
P I see. Can you tell me if there is any extra space where people might put their things then?
N Such a place doesn't exist, and I woulnd't try to find it my brother.
E
P Is anyone here into collecting angel figurines?
N No, I am only interested in statues of the buddha.
P I can only hope they are less inappropiate.
P I see.
E
P Is anyone here into collecting angel figurines?
N No, I am only interested in statues of the buddha.
P I can only hope they are less inappropiate.
P I see.
E
P Hello?
N Don't worry, it's catnip.
P Have you noticed any suspicious activity around the office pertaining to tax fraud?
N No I have not been frauding any faxes, I usually send stuff per mail.
P ... Alright.
N Don't look in the trash behind me.
E
P Is this import tax receipt yours?
N No.
E
P I heard you were carrying a big box into the office. What did you order?
N Oh that wasn't mine. Somebody asked me to carry it for them as a favour.
P Who?
N I don't remember. I might have been very inebriated.
P Where did you put it?
N I don't remember that either.
P (Sigh.)
E
P I heard you were carrying a big box into the office. What did you order?
N Oh that wasn't mine. Somebody asked me to carry it for them as a favour.
P Who?
N I don't remember. I might have been very inebriated.
P Where did you put it?
N I don't remember that either.
P (Sigh.)
E
P The address on this package has been scratched off, do you know who it might belong to?
N A dress? What dress.
P Please just tell me if there's any place people might be hiding stuff in around here.
N Oh yeah, the GOON ROOM.
P The what?
N It's the room where people store all the stuff that is way too inappropiate for their workplace.
P Why don't people just order it home???
N We live here.
N Well, thankfully the GOON ROOM safely hidden inside the STORAGE ROOM, you can't even see the door because of all the stuff in front of it.
N So nobody will be able to find it.
NPWhoops.
E

N Well, thankfully the GOON ROOM safely hidden inside the STORAGE ROOM, you can't even see the door because of all the stuff in front of it.
N So nobody will be able to find it.
N Whoops.
E

N  I don't have money.
E

N  I don't have money.

P There is nothing special about it...
P Hello?
P Hmmm just a long eardrum bursting tone
E
P I dont think this phone knows anything about this paper..
P Well i guess it doesnt hurt to try
P ouch my ears, I guess it did hurt...
E

E

P I suppose it is nice talking to someone who isnt crazy...
